xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.15 Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika » 1.15.2 Sammattaniyatapada » 1.15.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika
Sammattaniyatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
443.
962Hetu sammattaniyato dhammo hetussa sammattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
444.
963Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
964Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
965Nahetupaccayā adhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
966(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetu-adhipatiup1.15.3 Aniyatapada >>
